html: Rob asked my office that when we shared his story, that we share his advice: “Don’t be afraid to call your representative for help – Stick to the facts and they will do everything they can.” 9/
text: Rob asked my office that when we shared his story, that we share his advice: “Don’t be afraid to call your representative for help – Stick to the facts and they will do everything they can.” 9/

html: Within a few weeks, we were able to help Rob and his wife get a Medicare exemption so their policy could be reinstated. 8/
text: Within a few weeks, we were able to help Rob and his wife get a Medicare exemption so their policy could be reinstated. 8/

html: Then Rob called my office, and my staff got to work. 7/
text: Then Rob called my office, and my staff got to work. 7/

html: They worried that they’d have to pay for their medications with credit cards, piling up debts that’d place their whole retirement in jeopardy. 6/
text: They worried that they’d have to pay for their medications with credit cards, piling up debts that’d place their whole retirement in jeopardy. 6/

html: They were told their insurance policy could not be reinstated, and that they’d have to wait several months to get their coverage back. 5/
text: They were told their insurance policy could not be reinstated, and that they’d have to wait several months to get their coverage back. 5/

html: But then Rob and his wife received a cancellation notice. It turned out his insurance company was checking the wrong account all along, and his automatic payments had been turned off. 4/
text: But then Rob and his wife received a cancellation notice. It turned out his insurance company was checking the wrong account all along, and his automatic payments had been turned off. 4/

html: He called his insurance agent repeatedly, and was assured he’d paid in full. 3/
text: He called his insurance agent repeatedly, and was assured he’d paid in full. 3/

html: They paid for a private insurance plan to supplement their Medicare coverage. But Rob began to receive notices from his insurance company claiming that he owed them money, even though he had set up automatic payments. 2/
text: They paid for a private insurance plan to supplement their Medicare coverage. But Rob began to receive notices from his insurance company claiming that he owed them money, even though he had set up automatic payments. 2/

html: After 10 long years of seeking assistance with his immigration case, Jon said he really appreciated my team’s fast work and efforts to keep him updated with progress on his case. 6/
text: After 10 long years of seeking assistance with his immigration case, Jon said he really appreciated my team’s fast work and efforts to keep him updated with progress on his case. 6/

html: My office worked quickly to schedule Jon an interview with immigration services in Sacramento, and just a few months later, Jon finally received his green card. 5/
text: My office worked quickly to schedule Jon an interview with immigration services in Sacramento, and just a few months later, Jon finally received his green card. 5/

html: Then Jon contacted my office hoping we could inquire about the ongoing delays and help him get the stability he desperately needed for his business. 4/
text: Then Jon contacted my office hoping we could inquire about the ongoing delays and help him get the stability he desperately needed for his business. 4/

html: The uncertainty began to take a toll, and he couldn’t devote himself as fully as he wanted to to his business. 3/
text: The uncertainty began to take a toll, and he couldn’t devote himself as fully as he wanted to to his business. 3/

html: Unfortunately, even though he had been in the country legally for years, Jon kept having one delay after another getting his green card. 2/
text: Unfortunately, even though he had been in the country legally for years, Jon kept having one delay after another getting his green card. 2/

text: My staff is here to help constituents in their time of need, and I am glad we could help Courtney and her family. 8/

html: We worked with the State Department to expedite Courtney’s case and she received her passports just two days later. She and her family were able to make the trip and pay their respects to her grandmother. 7/
text:
We worked with the State Department to expedite Courtney’s case and she received her passports just two days later.

She and her family were able to make the trip and pay their respects to her grandmother.  7/

html: We followed up with the State Department and learned a mistake was made processing Courtney’s request. 6/
text: We followed up with the State Department and learned a mistake was made processing Courtney’s request. 6/

html: After hearing Courtney’s story, my office got right to work. 5/
text: After hearing Courtney’s story, my office got right to work.  5/

html: The IRS told Steve they wouldn’t process his tax return until he provided a proof of identity and many past tax returns supporting his claim. They said he needed to complete an in-person interview, which would stop Steve from performing surgery on short notice. 3/
text: The IRS told Steve they wouldn’t process his tax return until he provided a proof of identity and many past tax returns supporting his claim. They said he needed to complete an in-person interview, which would stop Steve from performing surgery on short notice. 3/

html: Last year, Steve filed his taxes in March, well ahead of the filing deadline. He was owed a substantial tax refund, so he waited to hear back from the IRS. But two months later Steve was stonewalled by bureaucratic red tape. 2/
